title: Best of The Herd: 08/01/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 08/01/2019
description:
Colin thinks Jerry and Stephen Jones are really smart and saying everything right during the Ezekiel Elliott holdout.  He says the Steelers love how much the Browns are talking and explains why.  Plus, Greg Cosell of NFL Films breaks down all of the top college QBs including a sleeper that could be the next Carson Wentz 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
